prompt.title: Develop a HelloWorld Java Class program
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal:
Create a bash script which runs a function which waits for 180 seconds and every 10 seconds print "Hello World" in the console like this:
```bash #!/bin/bash
# Script that prints "Hello World" every 10 seconds for 180 seconds total for i in {1..18}; do echo "Hello World" # Wait for 10 seconds sleep 10 done ```
Save the bash script as `hello-world.sh` and run it with the command `./hello-world.sh`
prompt.safeguards: Ensure that the bash script is executable and runs successfully for 180 seconds

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The bash script is created in the current directory
The bash script is executable and runs successfully for 180 seconds
The bash script prints "Hello World" every 10 seconds
The bash script runs for 180 seconds to achieve the goal
